# Problem 1

```{r 1.1 setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE) #setting global option to not show code for knitr
library(ggplot2) #load package for creating plots
library(palmerpenguins) #load package for penguins data
```

```{r 1.2 examine dataset}
data("penguins", package = "palmerpenguins") #load penguins data set
colnames(penguins) #examine the variables
```

The `penguins` dataset contains `r nrow(penguins)` rows and `r ncol(penguins)` columns. The dataset contains the following variables:`r paste(colnames(penguins), collapse = ", ")`. The mean flipper length is `r mean(penguins$flipper_length_mm, na.rm = TRUE)`mm.
